frontmatter.title: Remove Array Duplicates
frontmatter.description: Remove Array Duplicates using ES6 Set. Convert it back to an array using Array.from

frontmatter.title: Clone an Array using ES6
frontmatter.description: When we need to copy an array, we often times used slice. But with ES6, you can also use the spread operator to duplicate an array.

frontmatter.title: Using ES6 Spread to split
frontmatter.description: Convert a string to an array of characters using the spread syntax!
